name: git-emoji-commit
description: Simple CLI to encourage more concise commits using emojis.

scripts.alpha-release: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.patch-release: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Sodium Halogen
